attributes.action: Call for Teresa May to resign due to inadequate and unfair representation!
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is staring you in the face.
attributes.background:
Teresa may is not doing right by the British public. She is too lenient and not doing all that can be to done to protect British people.
 Making a mockery of the brexit we voted for! 
 Putting the needs of others before our own!
 Cutting back on OUR services! Yet raising taxes.

rejection.details:
The resignation of the Prime Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
